data: {"generalSituation":"A dry northeast monsoon will bring slightly cooler weather to the coast of southern China in the next couple of days. With the monsoon moderating slightly midweek this week, temperatures will rise over the region, but the temperature difference between day and night will be relatively large over the inland areas. A broad band of clouds is expected to bring a few rain patches to southern China towards the weekend. With the band of clouds thinning out, the weather will become brighter over the region during the weekend to early next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251215","week":"Monday","forecastWind":"Northeast force 4, becoming east force 4 to 5.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy and dry. Cool in the morning.
